mapper.sql: division_no, branch_no, cno, division_name, enabled, update_time, create_time
mapper.select: select se.*, CONCAT(c.cname,'---',c.tname) as newsName, cp.branch_name as branchName from division se,news c,branch cp where se.cno=c.cno and se.branch_no=cp.branch_no and se.cno=#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.branch_no=#{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select se.*, CONCAT(c.cname,'---',c.tname) as newsName, cp.branch_name as branchName from division se,news c,branch cp where se.cno=c.cno and se.branch_no=cp.branch_no and se.cno=#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into division (division_no, branch_no, cno, division_name, enabled, update_time, create_time) values (#{divisionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into division
division_no,
branch_no,
cno,
division_name,
enabled,
update_time,
create_time,
#{divisionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{divisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update division
branch_no = #{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
division_name = #{divisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where division_no = #{divisionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update division set branch_no = #{branchNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, division_name = #{divisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} where division_no = #{divisionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
